mapper.select: SELECT FROM STAFF_ASSESSMENT_ITEM where STAFF_ASSESSMENT_ID = #{staffAssessmentId} and state='USE'
mapper.insert:

ID,

ITEM_NAME,

mapper.update:
update STAFF_ASSESSMENT_ITEM
STAFF_ASSESSMENT_ID = #{staffAssessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSESSMENT_PERCENT = #{assessmentPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRITERION_SCORE = #{criterionScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRITERION_DETAIL = #{criterionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE_DATE = #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update STAFF_ASSESSMENT_ITEM set STAFF_ASSESSMENT_ID = #{staffAssessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESSMENT_PERCENT = #{assessmentPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRITERION_SCORE = #{criterionScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRITERION_DETAIL = #{criterionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE_DATE = #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
